abstract: A first indication from a user is received. The indication includes a task to be performed using at least one application programming interface. A machine learning model is determine. At least one application programming interface is determined using the machine learning model and the request. The at least one application programming interface is provided to the user.
summary: <SOH> SUMMARY OF THE INVENTION <EOH>Embodiments of the present invention include a method, computer program product, and system for predicting application programming interface storytelling mapping. In one embodiment, a first indication from a user is received. The indication includes a task to be performed using at least one application programming interface. A machine learning model is determine. At least one application programming interface is determined using the machine learning model and the request. The at least one application programming interface is provided to the user.
title: PREDICTING API STORYTELLING MAPPING
